name: Crown Claimer
description:
A top down shooter where you must defend your crown at all costs!

Gameplay:

Gameplay consists of nothing but shooting. Enemies spawn in waves and will run to you guns blazing.
Play with a friend in Co-Op mode, or if you prefer, you can play by yourself in singleplayer.

Features:

  • Play with a friend in Co-Op or by yourself in Singleplayer.
  • Multiple enemy types and multiple arenas.
  • Full Controller Support
  • Completely Original OST
